ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides the Minecraft Building Assistance Game (MBAG), a multiagent environment for studying assistance games. It includes the implementation of the AssistanceZero algorithm for training AI assistants and allows integration with Minecraft via Project Malmo for visualization and interaction with human players. The repository also provides a house dataset for training and evaluation.
